parameter.Value: select t1.type_id as id,t1.type,t2.avatar,t2.competition_name from subscription t1 inner join competition t2 on t1.type_id=t2.competition_id and t1.type_id=2 and t1.type=4 and t1.is_valid=1
select t1.type_id as id,t1.type,t2.avatar,t2.announcer_name from subscription t1 inner join announcer t2 on t1.type_id=t2.announcer_id and t1.type_id=79 and t1.type=2 and t1.is_valid=1
select t1.type_id as id,t1.type,t2.screenshot,t2.channel_name from subscription t1 inner join channel t2 on t1.type_id=t2.channel_id and t1.type_id=88 and t1.type=1 and t1.is_valid=1
select t1.type_id as id,t1.type,t2.avatar,t2.highlight_name from subscription t1 inner join highlight t2 on t1.type_id=t2.highlight_id and t1.type_id=3 and t1.type=3 and t1.is_valid=1

StepParameter.Name: GetCommentList
StepParameter.CommandText: select user_id,nickname,text from user_comment where game_id=1 and user_id=400 and video_id=1 order by id desc limit 20

parameter.Value: select min(id) from user_comment where game_id=1 and user_id=400 and video_id=1 order by id desc limit 20

StepParameter.Name: GetCommentList
StepParameter.CommandText: select user_id,nickname,text from user_comment where game_id=1 and user_id=400 and channel_id=1 order by id desc limit 20

parameter.Value: select min(t1.id) from (select id from user_comment where game_id=1 and user_id=400 and channel_id=1 order by id desc limit 20) t1

StepParameter.Name: GetCommentList
StepParameter.CommandText: select user_id,nickname,text from user_comment where game_id=1 and user_id=400 and channel_id=1 and id <170 order by id desc limit 20

parameter.Value: select min(t1.id) from (select id from user_comment where game_id=1 and user_id=400 and channel_id=1 and id<170 order by id desc limit 20) t1

StepParameter.Name: GetMessage
StepParameter.CommandText: select t1.msg_id,t2.text from message_user t1 inner join message t2 on t1.msg_id=t2.id where t1.user_id=600 and t1.is_send=1 and t1.is_read=0
